actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 94-1375.

official_title: A bill to establish within the Department of the Interior the position of an additional Assistant Secretary of the Interior.

summary.text: Establishes within the Department of the Interior an additional Assistant Secretary of the Interior for Indian Affairs to be appointed by the President by and with the advice and consent of the Senate. Sets forth changes to existing laws as required by the replacement of the position of Commissioner of Indian Affairs by the position of Assistant Secretary of the Interior for Indian Affairs.

titles.title: A bill to establish within the Department of the Interior the position of an additional Assistant Secretary of the Interior.
